Changelog
=========

0.1 (2009-09-13)
------------------

 - Corrected the source of the Google Mail standard view [rockdj]
 - Added the ability for the portlets to work with hosted (GAFYD) or Google services [rockdj]
 - Created basic portlets utilising the relevant Google gadgets [rockdj]
 - Created recipe with ZopeSkel [rockdj].
